{{Terminology Infobox
|type         = Combat
}}
'''Area of Effect''', known as '''AoE''' in-game, is a term used to describe abilities that affect a wide spatial range. These abilities can affect multiple targets usually within a fixed radius.

AoEs have 3 possible shapes: Sphere, Cylinder, or Box.

==Examples==
===Cylinder===
{{Preview
|size=200px

|f1=Fantastic Voyage Preview
|c1=Fantastic Voyage Inspiration Field (6m Radius)

|f2=Kazuha Slash Preview
|c2=Kazuha Slash Autumn Whirlwind Field (9m Radius)
}}

}}

}}
